project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches current weather information for a specified city using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the command line interface to accept user input for the city
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the weather fetching and parsing features
Execute tests to ensure functionality works as expected
